code: import React from'react';import{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import api from'../utils/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await api.post('auth/login',{email,password});localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.token);navigate('/');}catch(error){alert('Đăng nhập thất bại');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u0110\u0103ng Nh\u1EADp"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),placeholder:"Email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"M\u1EADt kh\u1EA9u",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"\u0110\u0103ng Nh\u1EADp"})]})]});}export default Login;
